title: AI Summary Helper 🚀
aboutText: Elevate your browsing efficiency with AI Summary Helper. Don't miss out on any article again! 🌟
featureList: Supports OpenAI, Mistral AI, Ollama (local), and more models
Seamlessly Integrate Summaries into Your Reading Habit 📖
Mobile Reading: Easily Send to Kindle via Reabble 📖
Universal Compatibility: Bookmarklet Generator for All Browsers and OS, including iOS
proposeFeatureText: Have an innovative idea? Contribute to the evolution of AI Summary Helper! 💬
privacyNoteText: We prioritize your privacy above all. Rest assured, your data remains secure. 🔑
funMessage: Explore a smarter way of browsing with AI Summary Helper! 🎉
changelogList: Support for Local LLMs including Ollama / Llama models
Latest updates to support Mistral AI model
creatorText: Hello, Gumroad community 🙂 - I'm Phil Wornath, the brains behind AI Summary Helper. Driven by a passion for extensive online articles and scientific research, I often found reading material depths challenging within limited timeframes. This led me to create a tool designed to boost productivity and optimize reading efficiency.
whyHelperList: Reclaim Your Time: Craft quick digests or gear up for thorough reviews later.
Tailored to You: Adapt summaries to your linguistic style, professional demands, or unique perspective.
Stay Organized: Keep your tabs tidy and your reading list under control.
Enhanced Reading Experience: Concentrate on pivotal content without feeling swamped.
getStartedText: To begin harnessing AI Summary Helper, make sure you possess an OpenAI API key and ample credit. Become part of our journey in simplifying web reading for everyone. Download today on Gumroad and revolutionize your web interactions.
feedbackSupportText: We invite you to experience AI Summary Helper and eagerly await your insights and inquiries. Let's simplify and enrich web browsing together. Boost your online reading journey with AI Summary Helper starting now!
